this impacts other applications running

another issue that we run into is

so when you have a proxy per host a

the proxy is completely decoupled from

predictable
you also widen the failure domain so

so if there's a proxy malfunction
because of that because that proxy is
servicing many applications all at once
there's a there's a single point of

the sidecar is within the same security

same policy it applies mtls to traffic
to and from the same pod and it only
needs the key material for that pod
also it another good thing is that it

the resource consumption scales with the

this is a good thing because we as we

only that if the application is

also doesn't need to consume a lot of
